mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_sboard (userno, title, content, regdate, updatedate, deleteat, viewcnt) VALUES (#{userno}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), 'N', 0)
mapper.select: SELECT brdno, userno, title, content, regdate, updatedate, deleteat, viewcnt FROM tbl_sboard WHERE deleteat = 'N' ORDER BY brdno DESC, regdate DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT brdno, userno, title, content, regdate, updatedate, deleteat, viewcnt FROM tbl_sboard WHERE brdno = #{brdno}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_sboard SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE brdno= #{brdno}
mapper.delete: UPDATE tbl_sboard SET deleteat = 'Y' WHERE brdno= #{brdno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(brdno) FROM tbl_sboard WHERE deleteat = 'N'
